item.title: For heart repair, call RNA
item.description:
For heart repair, call RNA

When people suffer a heart attack, they can't regrow muscle cells that have died after being deprived of oxygen. But mice injected with small RNA molecules following heart attacks do regenerate cardiac muscle, researchers report in the March 18 Science Translational Medicine.

item.title: The emperor's mighty brother
item.description:
The emperor's mighty brother

BY THE middle of May, the snowline in Yushu prefecture has retreated to the peaks of its steep valleys. Nomads who have spent the winter at the bottom of them have begun to herd their yaks and goats to higher pastures, where the first shoots of green have replaced the scorching white of winter.
